header.subtitle: Scrum Master | Engineering Team Lead | Software Engineer
header.tagline: Certified ScrumMaster® focused on delivery and outcomes
header.description_1: Strategic and results-driven Certified ScrumMaster® with a track record of leading Agile teams to deliver high-impact software solutions. Skilled at facilitating collaboration between stakeholders, Product Owners, and development teams to ensure delivery of business value on time and within scope.
header.description_2: Adept at optimizing processes (+30% team velocity at DabaDoc), removing obstacles, and fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

intro.title: Software Engineer & Certified ScrumMaster®

intro.supporting: I bridge business goals and technical execution, driving measurable outcomes in fast-paced corporate environments.
intro.philosophy: Recognized for clear communication, conflict resolution, and pragmatic delivery.
